content.body: bakkot: I still feel it's weird for the receiver and argument to use different logic for how to access their values, but if this is a requirement, then the way the proposal is currently accessing the argument's data looks good. (I like in particular that it, incidentally, prevents accidentally passing a plain string and having it interpreted as a Set of letters.)

content.body: The rest of the details seem fine too. My only complaint is still about the term 'difference' not suggesting directionality quite strongly enough (and `symmetricDifference` being just *so long*), but I expressed that in an issue a few years back and won't block if the champions ended up deciding it's okay.
